title: Intravenous anaesthesia. Part 1
creator_credit: Yvonne Fletcher, ICI (GB) and Realist Films
brief_description: Deals with the general principles of administering intravenous anaesthetic, including demonstrations of essential apparatus, technique of venepuncture, course of anaesthesia with sodium pentothal, and the dangers against which to guard.
description: Deals with the general principles of administering intravenous anaesthetic, including demonstrations of essential apparatus, technique of venepuncture, course of anaesthesia with sodium pentothal, and the dangers against which to guard.
